Note: Signed "Maurice Romberg." "Visa No. 13364" appears on the bottom right of the poster. Orientation: Vertical.
Description: Text in French says Algerian Company. Subscribe to the Loan of the Liberation. Illustration shows an Algerian man on a horse.
